name: Cuesta Rey - Centenario - Natural - Pyramid No. 9
additionalNotes: Expertly hand-rolled by A. Fuente in the DR, the Cuesta Rey Centenario #60 and 'Centennial' cigars are distinguished by their smooth, rich flavor blended from only the finest long filler tobaccos, Dominican binder and five-year-aged Connecticut shade natural or Connecticut sun-grown Maduro wrappers. Every Cuesta Rey Centenario #60 and Centennial cigar is aged inside a special cedar-lined humidor for 120 days to achieve the ultimate in taste, flavor and aroma.
